review: Love love love my fire stick!!!!! Hated paying the price of dish, direct, cable, ect.
author: T Davis

review: Make even the dumbest TV smart! This is an awesome device... I bought 2!
author: Silverspork

review: It's a neat little device.  Biggest negative personally is lack of free, meaningful content.
author: Methusaleh

review: A little trouble with the setup but got through that & it works great
author: Richard Jorgensen

review: The Fire tv stick is excellent . I dont recommend it for gaming if you are going to use it for playing movies and tv shows.
author: Randell Smeaton

review: Easy to use and lots of programs to watch.We especially like the prime programs.
author: Lawrence Dipiazza

review: I have had it up and running for a short time but so far, excellent.  I bought another one for a second tv.
author: Judith K. Reme "Judith K. Reme"

review: Fast, high-def, versatile. Best streaming player available, and I have a Roku, 2 smart TVs, streaming Bluray, and a DLink.
author: L. Beer "LB"
